abstract: If ever there was any doubt that Anheuser-Busch intends to fight InBev tooth and nail, the American brewer’s lawsuit on Monday should dispel them.
lead_paragraph: If ever there was any doubt that Anheuser-Busch intends to fight InBev tooth and nail, the American brewer’s lawsuit on Monday should dispel them.

headline.main: In New Lawsuit, Anheuser Swings Hard at InBev
